biocontainers.name: ropebwt2
biocontainers.summary: Incremental construction of fm-index for dna sequences

biotools.summary: A tool for constructing the FM-index for a collection of DNA sequences. It works by incrementally inserting one or multiple sequences into an existing pseudo-BWT position by position, starting from the end of the sequences.

bioschemas.name: RopeBWT2
bioschemas.summary: A tool for constructing the FM-index for a collection of DNA sequences. It works by incrementally inserting one or multiple sequences into an existing pseudo-BWT position by position, starting from the end of the sequences.
